statements: SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM products GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY category, price DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND stock_quantity > 10 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE stock_quantity <= 50 AND category IN ('Clothing', 'Accessories')
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY price
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM Products WHERE quantity_in_stock > 100;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-04-30';
SELECT product_id, SUM(units_sold) AS total_units_sold FROM Sales GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT product_name, units_sold, revenue FROM Products JOIN Sales ON Products.product_id = Sales.product_id WHERE revenue > 1000
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM Products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC

SELECT product_name, SUM(units_sold) AS total_units_sold FROM Products JOIN Sales ON Products.product_id = Sales.product_id GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_units_sold > 50 ORDER BY total_units_sold DESC
SELECT * FROM ProductInventory
SELECT product_name, available_quantity FROM ProductInventory
SELECT product_name, demand_forecast FROM ProductInventory ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT * FROM SalesHistory WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date FROM SalesHistory ORDER BY sale_quantity
SELECT * FROM ProductInventory WHERE available_quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, available_quantity FROM ProductInventory WHERE demand_forecast > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(adjusted_quantity) AS total_adjustments FROM InventoryAdjustments GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_adjustments DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, s.sale_date, s.sale_quantity FROM ProductInventory p JOIN SalesHistory s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE s.sale_quantity > 50 ORDER BY s.sale_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS unique_products, AVG(available_quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM ProductInventory WHERE available_quantity < 50 GROUP BY demand_forecast HAVING avg_quantity > 20;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM Product WHERE stock_quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT product_name, total_amount FROM Sales JOIN Product ON Sales.product_id = Product.product_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT forecast_date, predicted_demand, variance FROM DemandForecast WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product WHERE stock_quantity < 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, s.sale_date, s.quantity_sold, s.total_amount FROM Product p JOIN Sales s ON p.product_id = s.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock < 100 ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, total_price FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM products LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, s.sale_date, p.product_name, s.quantity_sold FROM customers c JOIN sales s ON c.customer_id = s.sale_id JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE s.quantity_sold > 5 ORDER BY s.sale_date;

SELECT p.product_name, i.quantity_in_stock, f.forecast_date, f.predicted_demand FROM products p JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN demand_forecast f ON p.product_id = f.product_id WHERE i.quantity_in_stock < f.predicted_demand;
SELECT SUM(total_price) AS total_sales, AVG(quantity_sold) AS avg_quantity_sold FROM sales;
